hero.name: Cándido Aguilar
hero.description: My approach combines backend robustness with the agility of modern architectures.

about.paragraph1: Full stack Developer with a solid focus on creating scalable and secure applications. My professional journey has centered on developing critical platforms for managing government procedures and international consular services.

about.paragraph2: I have built complex workflows for the acquisition of official documents and visas, ensuring data integrity in high-security environments and integrating large-scale financial systems such as payment gateways and SAP ecosystems.

about.paragraph3: Outside of my professional environment, I am passionate about exploring modern architectures. I apply patterns like Hexagonal Architecture and DDD in my personal projects, experimenting with cloud-native technologies and asynchronous messaging systems like Kafka.

experience.description: Development and maintenance of a critical large-scale government services platform. Responsible for implementing complete end-to-end user flows, from the interactive frontend to the backend logic. Key role in the integration of financial systems and proprietary payment gateways, ensuring the reliability of international transactions.

Implementation of web solutions for managing consular and administrative procedures. Development of advanced monitoring dashboards and internal administration tools. Specialized in data synchronization with SAP business systems and in optimizing document request processes for high-security environments.
